name: simplyconfig
description: Hierarchical configuration. A replacement to nconf.

scripts.test: export FOO_API_KEY=27A13 && export BAR_API_KEY=A312 && export NODEJS__server__port=1234 && export FOO__server__port=2345 && export NODEJSxxxserverxxxport=3456 && mocha --debug --check-leaks --require tests/init.js lib/*.spec.js tests/*.spec.js
scripts.testsingle: export FOO_API_KEY=27A13 && export BAR_API_KEY=A312 && export NODEJS__server__port=1234 && export FOO__server__port=2345 && export NODEJSxxxserverxxxport=3456 && mocha --debug --check-leaks --require tests/init.js lib/store.spec.js
